abstract: Catherine Rampell reviews National Asian American Theater Company revival of Harold Pinter play The Dumb Waiter, directed by Andrew Pang and starring Louis Ozawa Changchien and Stephen Park.
snippet: “The Dumb Waiter,” Harold Pinter’s one-act play, follows two hit men killing time before targeting something more sentient.
lead_paragraph: “The Dumb Waiter,” Harold Pinter’s one-act play, follows two hit men killing time before targeting something more sentient.

headline.main: Waiting, Waiting and Waiting Some More for a Kill Order
headline.print_headline: Waiting, Waiting and Waiting Some More for a Kill Order
headline.seo: ‘The Dumb Waiter’ at the Duo Theater - Review
